option6.name: RSTDISBL
option6.desc: Reset Disabled (Enable PC6 as i/o pin)

option10.name: EESAVE
option10.desc: Preserve EEPROM through the Chip Erase cycle

case1.message: These fuse settings will disable the ISP interface!

case2.message: Disabling external reset will make the ISP interface inaccessible!

case3.message: Enabling DEBUGWIRE will make the ISP interface inaccessible!

case4.message: Using this clock option together with the CKDIV8 fuse bit will require a slow ISP speed ~2kHz.

case5.message: Using this clock option together with the CKDIV8 fuse bit will require a slow ISP speed ~2kHz.

case6.message: Using this clock option together with the CKDIV8 fuse bit will require a slow ISP speed ~2kHz.
